middle-east.name: Middle East
middle-east.description: World-class diving in the Red Sea and Persian Gulf

red-sea.name: Red Sea
red-sea.description: Legendary for its coral reefs, wrecks, and clear warm waters, spanning Egypt, Sudan, Jordan, Israel, and Saudi Arabia.

egypt.name: Egypt
egypt.description: Red Sea mecca: Ras Mohammed, Brothers, and Thistlegorm wreck.

jordan.name: Jordan
jordan.description: Aqaba's coral reefs and wrecks at the tip of the Red Sea.

israel.name: Israel
israel.description: Eilat's easy-access Red Sea diving and vibrant reefs.

saudi-arabia.name: Saudi Arabia
saudi-arabia.description: Untouched Red Sea reefs, liveaboards, and new dive frontiers.

uae.name: United Arab Emirates
uae.description: Wrecks, artificial reefs, and warm Persian Gulf waters.

oman.name: Oman
oman.description: Fjords, whale sharks, and rich macro life in the Arabian Sea.

yemen.name: Yemen
yemen.description: Socotra's legendary biodiversity and remote diving.
